CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 11, 1958, pg. 8, reads: "Walking the Picket Lines - As the hotel strike enters its second week here in Pittsburgh, among those employees striking against management and walking the picket lines are (left photo) Ruth Williams, shown outside the Sherwyn Hotel... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Ruth Williams picketing with sandwich board reading "On Strike for Better Wages, Working Conditions! ... Hotel & Restaurant Employers Union Local 237...," on sidewalk in front of Sherwyn Hotel, Downtown
